text: Bennie Gordon Thompson (born January 28, 1948) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for since 1993. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He has been the Chairman of the Committee on Homeland Security since 2019. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Mississippi Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Bennie Thompson
